error.message: Call to deprecated constant DRUPAL_ANONYMOUS_RID: Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use Drupal\Core\Session\AccountInterface::ANONYMOUS_ROLE or \Drupal\user\RoleInterface::ANONYMOUS_ID instead.

Call to deprecated constant DRUPAL_AUTHENTICATED_RID: Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use Drupal\Core\Session\AccountInterface::AUTHENTICATED_ROLE or \Drupal\user\RoleInterface::AUTHENTICATED_ID instead.
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to simple_access.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
